availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Adkisson (Breckinridge County, Kentucky, merchant and sheriff)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, merchant and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Letitia Adkisson. Father of Mary H. Adkisson, Oscar Adkisson, and Fannie F. Adkisson. Merchant and sheriff in Breckinridge County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Stephensport, p. 4.
Find A Grave, "Thomas Adkisson (July 6, 1816-July 11, 1920)," Memorial #28650474, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/28650474 (accessed April 24, 2018).
